original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color>$Skill_CD(2041)@<color=#FFE787>技能射程：</color>$Skill_range(2041)@ 在隨機1個敵武將處突起一叢尖石柱，造成目標$Skill_Int(2041)@智力傷害，同時造成目標暈眩$Status_duration(121)@秒。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color>$Skill_CD(2041)@<color=#FFE787>Skill range: </color>$Skill_range(2041)@ A bunch of random enemy generals The sharp stone pillar causes the target to be $Skill_Int(2041)@intelligence damage and stuns the target $Status_duration(121)@sec.
